meanings.definition: Not able to be defined or described.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset was undefinable.
meanings.sent2: Her joy at the surprise party was undefinable.
meanings.sent3: The taste of the new ice cream flavor was undefinable.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of nostalgia was as undefinable as a distant memory.
meanings.sent5: The mystery of the old house was truly undefinable.

meanings.sent1: The magic of the circus performance was undefinable.
meanings.sent2: His talent for music was truly undefinable.
meanings.sent3: The excitement of the roller coaster ride was undefinable.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the siblings was as undefinable as it was strong.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of freedom on the open road was undefinable.
